SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.main

Class Extensions

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.main.Extensions
public class Extensions extends Object
Server and client SMTP extensions container.

Every SMTP verb is implemented by an extension.

Each extension has a server and a client implementation.

The server will select the appropriate extension to the SMTP verb it receives.

The client however has a behaviour which defines what command will be issued when.

See Also:
  • Verb
  • ClientProcessor
  • ServerProcessor
  • Behaviour
